short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Choose when to show your email inbox.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sometimes when you go to your email-account you might like to mail someone first, and care about new mail from others later. This extension lets you do this: It hides your inbox until you chose to see it. For Google Mail.
